title: Disconnected from chat
body:
a few days ago when i try to login to the game after i enter my username and password i get this :
Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server 
Now i log in and i can play but i am disconnected from the chat and i have some lags i don't know why?  Help pls

replies.body: It sounds like you are experiencing a pretty unstable connection between your network and our servers.  I recommend going over our [Troubleshoot Connection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to tighten up your connection and prevent further interruptions.
Still same now i can see chat liste some times.... but i still get lags
